document_data.name: Pole
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pole''' was a prison located in the city of [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The Pole was located in the eastern section of Almorel adjacent to the [[Dwarven Mir]].
document_data.Activities: In addition to housing Almorel's convicted criminals who weren't executed at the [[Hanging Place]], the Pole served a ground where duels were settled.
